title: Smart Data Models - UnderexcLimIEEE2
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents the Type UEL2 which has either a straight-line or multi-segment characteristic when plotted in terms of machine reactive power output vs. real power output.  Reference: IEEE UEL2 421.5-2005 Section 10.2.  (Limit characteristic lookup table shown in Figure 10.4 (p 32) of the standard).

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be UnderexcLimIEEE2

k1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL terminal voltage exponent applied to real power input to UEL limit look-up table (k1).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0.0

k2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL terminal voltage exponent applied to reactive power output from UEL limit look-up table (k2).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0.0

kfb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain associated with optional integrator feedback input signal to UEL (K).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kuf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL excitation system stabilizer gain (K).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kui.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL integral gain (K).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0.0

kul.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL proportional gain (K).  Typical Value = 0.8. Default: 0.0

p0.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Real power values for endpoints (P).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

p1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Real power values for endpoints (P).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0.0

p10.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Real power values for endpoints (P). Default: 0.0

p2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Real power values for endpoints (P).  Typical Value = 0.6. Default: 0.0

p3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Real power values for endpoints (P).  Typical Value = 0.9. Default: 0.0

p4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Real power values for endpoints (P).  Typical Value = 1.02. Default: 0.0

p5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Real power values for endpoints (P). Default: 0.0

p6.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Real power values for endpoints (P). Default: 0.0

p7.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Real power values for endpoints (P). Default: 0.0

p8.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Real power values for endpoints (P). Default: 0.0

p9.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Real power values for endpoints (P). Default: 0.0

q0.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reactive power values for endpoints (Q).  Typical Value = -0.31. Default: 0.0

q1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reactive power values for endpoints (Q).  Typical Value = -0.31. Default: 0.0

q10.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reactive power values for endpoints (Q). Default: 0.0

q2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reactive power values for endpoints (Q).  Typical Value = -0.28. Default: 0.0

q3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reactive power values for endpoints (Q).  Typical Value = -0.21. Default: 0.0

q4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reactive power values for endpoints (Q).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

q5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reactive power values for endpoints (Q). Default: 0.0

q6.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reactive power values for endpoints (Q). Default: 0.0

q7.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reactive power values for endpoints (Q). Default: 0.0

q8.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reactive power values for endpoints (Q). Default: 0.0

q9.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reactive power values for endpoints (Q). Default: 0.0

tu1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL lead time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tu2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tu3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL lead time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tu4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tul.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant associated with optional integrator feedback input signal to UEL (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tup.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Real power filter time constant (T).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0

tuq.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reactive power filter time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tuv.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Voltage filter time constant (T).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0

vuimax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL integrator output maximum limit (V).  Typical Value = 0.25. Default: 0.0

vuimin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL integrator output minimum limit (V).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

vulmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL output maximum limit (V).  Typical Value = 0.25. Default: 0.0

vulmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL output minimum limit (V).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0
